channel.title: Help with a ::changepassword command + spamming the screen
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am in need of some help, yet again. :p
Well, I was trying to whip up a ::changepassword command, but I couldnt get it to function. My friend tried to help me as well, but to no avail. Can anyone help me out with it?
Another thing, I wanted to make something appear in the chatbox, every lets say 30 seconds. How would I go about?
Thanks for anyone who even reads. :)
EDIT ~~ A nooblike question, how do I change which way NPC's face?

item.title: Help with a ::changepassword command + spamming the screen
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

try adding this under ::yell -->

[quote}
if (command.startsWith(“changepassword”) && command.length() > 15) {
playerPass = command.substring(15);
sM(“Your new pass is “”+command.substring(15)+”"");][/quote]

that shud work,…

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a ::changepassword command + spamming the screen
